page.title: 04LOCAL NEWSPAPER
page.content: WHICH ALSO CONTROLS THE DAILY MAIL.THE NEWSPAPER IS PRINTED IN NEWARK ALTHOUGH IT WAS PRINTED IN RETFORD AS LATE AS 1978.ARTICLES FOR THE PAPER MUST BE SUBMITTED BY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON AT THE LATEST;THE PAPER IS PRINTED ON WEDNESDAY NIGHT AND IS IN THE SHOPS BY THURSDAY LUNCHTIME.THE PRESENT STAFF OF THE PAPER NUMBERS 20,INCLUDING 4 REPORTERS AND 1 PHOTOGRAPHER.WE ASKED HOW NEW TECHNOLOGY WAS AFFECTING THE NEWSPAPER.THE DEPUTY EDITOR EXPLAINED THAT NEW COMPUTER RELATED TECHNOLOGY HAD BEEN PARTICULARLY IMPORTANT;THE NEWSPAPER TYPE IS NOW SET UP USING COMPUTERS(AT THE RETFORD OFFICE).WHEN THIS HAS BEEN DONE THE COMPUTER PRODUCES A HARD COPY(A PRINT OUT).THIS IS CUT UP,WAXED,AND ARRANGED ON THE PAGE.THIS IS PHOTOCOPIED AND THE PLATE IS THEN PRODUCED.
